update t_fixed_asset
source = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_home_page = #{isHomePage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comfrom = #{comfrom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entrust_begintime = #{entrustBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
entrust_endtime = #{entrustEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
asset_rental = #{assetRental,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
used_year = #{usedYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_nature = #{houseNature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_size = #{houseSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
has_house_certificate = #{hasHouseCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_pledge = #{isPledge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_law = #{isLaw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_judgement = #{isJudgement,jdbcType=INTEGER},
asset_describe = #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
righter_name = #{righterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
righter_address = #{righterAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
righter_province = #{righterProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
righter_city = #{righterCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
righter_area = #{righterArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
righter_contact_phone = #{righterContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
righter_contact_name = #{righterContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
righter_type = #{righterType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
collection_num = #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dispose_num = #{disposeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time=now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_fixed_asset set source = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_home_page = #{isHomePage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comfrom = #{comfrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entrust_begintime = #{entrustBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entrust_endtime = #{entrustEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, asset_rental = #{assetRental,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_year = #{usedYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_nature = #{houseNature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_size = #{houseSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, has_house_certificate = #{hasHouseCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_pledge = #{isPledge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_law = #{isLaw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_judgement = #{isJudgement,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_describe = #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_name = #{righterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_address = #{righterAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_province = #{righterProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_city = #{righterCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_area = #{righterArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_contact_phone = #{righterContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_contact_name = #{righterContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_type = #{righterType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_num = #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dispose_num = #{disposeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time=now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_fixed_asset set source = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_type = #{assetType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_home_page = #{isHomePage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comfrom = #{comfrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entrust_begintime = #{entrustBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entrust_endtime = #{entrustEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, asset_rental = #{assetRental,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, used_year = #{usedYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_nature = #{houseNature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_size = #{houseSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, has_house_certificate = #{hasHouseCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_pledge = #{isPledge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_law = #{isLaw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_judgement = #{isJudgement,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asset_describe = #{assetDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_name = #{righterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_address = #{righterAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_province = #{righterProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_city = #{righterCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_area = #{righterArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, righter_contact_phone = #{righterContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_contact_name = #{righterContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, righter_type = #{righterType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_num = #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dispose_num = #{disposeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT tap.*,(SELECT su.name FROM t_sale_user su WHERE id=tap.oper_user) operUserName,dis.dispose_type,dis.alg,dis.value,taf.type file_type,taf.filename,lab.name lable_name, lab.type lable_type,b.id business_id,b.create_id FROM t_business_obj_re bor LEFT JOIN business b ON b.id=bor.business_id LEFT JOIN t_fixed_asset tap ON tap.id=bor.object_id LEFT JOIN t_dispose dis ON dis.asset_id=tap.id AND dis.asset_type=#{objectType} LEFT JOIN t_asset_file taf ON taf.asset_id=tap.id AND taf.asset_type=#{objectType} LEFT JOIN (SELECT lar.id,lar.asset_type,lar.assset_id,l.name,l.type FROM t_label_asset_re lar,t_label l WHERE l.id=lar.label_id) lab ON lab.assset_id=tap.id AND lab.asset_type=#{objectType} WHERE bor.object_type=#{objectType}
Limit #{startPage},#{pageCount}
SELECT count(tap.id) FROM t_business_obj_re bor LEFT JOIN business b ON b.id=bor.business_id LEFT JOIN t_fixed_asset tap ON tap.id=bor.object_id WHERE bor.object_type=#{objectType}
